member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.FromBodyAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a parameter or property should be bound using the request body.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.FromFormAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a parameter or property should be bound using form-data in the request body.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.FromQueryAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a parameter or property should be bound using the request query string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.FromRouteAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a parameter or property should be bound using route-data from the current request.
